DataChecksum.Ignore: DisplayName, ShortName, Capitol, Description, UnitSkinColor, UnitHairColor, UnitClothColor, BuildingPrimaryColor, BuildingSecondaryColor, BuildingRoofColor, BuildingStyle, UnitStyle, WorkerName

FlavorText.Text: It is good to see [L_LeaderName] showing a little humility and respect. Your tribute demonstrates that [L_FactionShortName] may be worthy of continued existence. For now.
Your newfound humility comes too late, [L_LeaderName]. We have already decided that you are unworthy of continued existence.
You cannot be serious. Our armies will destroy you.
Is that a joke? We will crush you.
I will remember your demand when I see your head on a pike.
We are not ready to surrender. We shall fight on.
You overestimate your chances. We have...secret weapons coming.
You think you have beaten me? You think you have won? You shall see. Oh yes. You shall see.
You are not worthy to accept a surrender from.
I did not know that [L_LeaderName] had such a sense of humor.
